Sequencing Center: GEOMAR Helmholtz Centre for Ocean Research Kiel
Comments: Sequencing and assembly of draft genomes of cultured anoxygenic phototrophic bacteria

Isolation Comments: isolated from the South Andros Black Hole cave system (Bahamas)
Comments: We sequenced the whole genome of the anaerobic purple sulfur bacterium Allochromatium palmeri DSM15591, originally isolated from the South Andros Black Hole cave system (Bahamas).
Allochromatium humboldtianum is a purple sulfur photosynthetic bacteria within the gamma proteobacteria. We have now sequenced the genome of the type strain DSM 21881.
We obtained a complete genome sequence of Allochromatium tepidum strain NZ. This strain belong to the Gammaproteobacteria class.

Isolation Comments: isolated from ditch water and is a model organism for studying phototrophic sulfur organization
Comments: Allochromatium vinosum DSM 180. Allochromatium vinosum DSM 180 (the type strain) was isolated from ditch water and is a model organism for studying phototrophic sulfur organization.
